topic_list.topic: Opening warm-up game aka tool training
Functions and characteristics of an ideal remote control
Feasibilities of potential functions concerning budget and pricing
Possible designing operations of remote controls
Potential designs which accord with demographic marketing strategies

tokenized_answer: The project manager introduced the upcoming project to the team and then the team members participated in an exercise in which they drew their favorite animals and discussed why they liked those particular animals.
The project manager discussed the project finances and the team engaged in a brainstorming session about various features to consider in designing a remote.
The project manager then further discussed the roles of the team members.
The selling price of the remote will be 25 Euro.
The profit aim will be 50 million Euro.
The remote will be sold internationally.
The production cost cannot exceed 12.50 Euro.
The remote will have a lock function.
The remote will control televisions and devices connected to televisions.
The team will create a back-up plan for a remote that only controls televisions
If the remote should be used only for televisions or if it should be capable of controlling other devices also.
Having a two sided remote with basic functions on one side and advanced functions on the other.

general_query_list.answer: The team got warmed-up through the opening drawing game which also works as the tool training process. The meeting was primarily composed of discussions among team members on potential functions and designs of remote controls based on their own life experiences. By then, feasibilities on budgets and demographic marketing strategies were also taken into consideration which influence greatly the potential functions and designs.

specific_query_list.query: What are the functions and characters discussed by the group that a remote control should incorporate?
specific_query_list.answer: Firstly the group confirmed that their target is a TV remote control. Marketing expects the control to be produced in medium size. User Interface indicated that the control should have a simple practical interface, without a great amount of buttons. Project Manager intended to relate the control with other devices like DVD, HI-FI, video, etc. And the team agreed on the inexpensiveness of the control.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: Firstly the group confirmed that their target is a TV remote control.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the group's discussion about technical and functional designs of the remote control?
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing believed that an ideal remote control should compress 3-4 different controllers in a thin combination. Users can switch controllers by sliding or flipping. Industrial Designer proposed a two-sided controller and said that he could keep it simple on one side and complicated on the other side.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: Marketing believed that an ideal remote control should compress 3-4 different controllers in a thin combination.

specific_query_list.query: How did the team reached an agreement on solving potential problems of the two-sided remote control?
specific_query_list.answer: Project Manager proposed the design of a flip telephone which could help solve this problem. When the controller is flipped open, users got all the buttons ; while basic buttons are on the cover. The team reached an agreement on it.

specific_query_list.query: What kind of design did the team proposed to help implement demographic marketing strategies?
